Text: ReHello All I thought Id drop everyone a line to say hello Im glad to hear that everyone is on celebrity watch Ive seen none let alone anyone with bang me against the headboard beauty I am a minor league baseball player though does that count for anything Im sorry to say that I wont be able to make it back for the fourth of July festivities but Im always there in spirit If anyone has a burning desire to see Lexington Kentucky Im your guy It is the tabacco capital of the world I just wanted to tell everyone hello and that I miss everyone As insane as that may be I hope everyone is well take care of each other we are all we have sometimes Take care JON

a little something to think aboutSue In lieu of my attendance in Austin I want to know if you have any good books for me to read Im gotten a list from Sam and from a friend at school but I thought that youd have some solid contributions A theory for the Prince of Peacers I debating the concept that we are a gigantic sociological experiment to God Im thinking that individually God knows nothing about us or cares for that matter I feel that when he gets tired of watching Jerry Springer reruns he looks down on our little planet form his layzboy and selects one of us at random throws a dose of adversity at us and watches how we handle it Gotta be more entertaining than watching fat half naked people air their dirty laundry on TV Then again maybe not I hope all is well Glad you like the new job JON
